scenes.title: The Challenge
scenes.narration_text: In a small village in Gujarat, Ila Sachani was born. But life presented a challenge—she could not use her hands like other children.
scenes.visual_prompt: A small village house in Gujarat. Baby Ila is born. Her hands hang loose by her sides. Her parents look worried.

scenes.title: The Desire
scenes.narration_text: While other children drew in the sand or plucked flowers, Ila wondered why she couldn't join them. She wanted to create too.
scenes.visual_prompt: Young Ila watching other kids draw in the sand. She looks sad, wanting to join in.

scenes.title: The Solution
scenes.narration_text: Her mother and grandmother decided to help. They taught her the traditional Kathiawar embroidery—using her feet! It was hard, but Ila was determined.
scenes.visual_prompt: Ila's mother and grandmother teaching her to hold a needle with her feet. Ila struggling but trying hard.

scenes.title: Mastering the Art
scenes.narration_text: Ila didn't give up. She became an expert. She learned many styles—Kachhi, Kashmiri, Lucknawi. Her feet wove magic.
scenes.visual_prompt: Montage of Ila growing up. Threading a needle with her toes. Creating complex, colorful designs on cloth.

scenes.title: Recognition
scenes.narration_text: Her talent was discovered. Her work was shown at a state exhibition. People were amazed by the beauty created by her feet.
scenes.visual_prompt: Government officials visiting her. They are amazed. Ila's work being displayed at an exhibition.

scenes.title: The Award
scenes.narration_text: Ila became a celebrated artist. She won many awards, including the President's Medal.
scenes.visual_prompt: Ila receiving a prestigious award (President's Medal). She smiles proudly.

scenes.title: Independence
scenes.narration_text: Ila found joy and independence. She proved that with hard work and never giving up, challenges can be turned into victories.
scenes.visual_prompt: Ila working happily, earning money, surrounded by her beautiful creations.
